document.full_text: in an effort to make the game more safe, the n.f.l. broke with recent tradition by voting for a rule change that is likely to lead to less scoring.
document.title: n.f.l. moves kickoffs to the 35
lines_and_colors: in an effort to make the game more safe, the n.f.l. broke with recent tradition by voting for a rule change that is likely to lead to less scoring.
